entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
